name: Creamy Southern Lima Beans
description: Loaded with flavor, these creamy southern lima beans are a delicious side dish or vegetarian main course. Soaked overnight and cooked in a creamy tomato sauce with a hint of smoky bacon.
keywords: lima beans, beans, southern, creamy, tomato sauce, bacon

recipeInstructions.text: Pick over the lima beans and rinse. Soak the beans overnight in a large bowl of cold water.

Drain and rinse the beans. Place in a large pot and cover with 3 inches of water. Add the salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 30 minutes, or until the beans are tender.
In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the garlic, onion, celery, and bell pepper. Cook until vegetables are softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the vegetable mixture to the pot of beans. Pour in the chicken broth and diced tomatoes. Stir in the crumbled bacon. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the sauce thickens.
